I think I need a newer kernel: you wont need a newer kernel that is a core part of your system but wont addect you user apps much, what you mght need is an upgrade of your distro

a kernel upgrade will not change your usefacing apps at all, if you want newer apps/unity you need to upgrade the install (e.g 10.4->11.10) i'm not suggesting that, just saying that messing with your kernel is unlikely to help
